name: Suomen Taksiliitto ry
memberOrga: STL has 10 regional member associations (http://www.taksiliitto.fi/suomen_taksiliitto/organisaatio/alueyhdistykset/) and about 280 local member associations (http://www.taksiliitto.fi/suomen_taksiliitto/organisaatio/alueyhdistykset/).
goal: Suomen Taksiliitto ry ( the Finnish Taxi Owners' Federation) represents taxi companies and dispatch centres. It has around 7000 members.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: STL's main focus is on the European Union transport and traffic policy and other policies covering the road transport market. Areas of interest also include Mobility as a Service and the digitisation of transport. STL is also interested in EU initiatives concerning small and medium sized enterprises.
